name: Tetris & Dr. Mario
description:
Two of the most popular puzzle games return, but now together in an exclusive compilation for SNES. The games have a slight graphical update when compared with the original Game Boy and NES games, but the gameplay remains totally faithful to the games released for both platforms.

In Tetris, the main objective is to pile blocks that will fall down continuously, in order to create a row or "line" without spaces. For this collection, the game comes with two bonus options: 2 PLAYER GAME (absent in the NES version) and VS. COM (absent in both versions), with 3 CPU opponents available, each one representing a difficulty level (EASY, MEDIUM, and HARD, respectively).

In Dr. Mario, the objective is to eliminate all the viruses contained in a big bottle. Dr. Mario (situated in the upper-right side of the screen) will throw capsules with 6 different color combinations (Red-Red, Red-Blue, Yellow-Yellow, Red-Yellow, Blue-Blue and Blue-Yellow) in order to line up at least four viruses or capsules of the same color horizontally or vertically and to make them disappear. In this compilation, the game comes with a bonus option: VS. COM, where you'll face the CPU players: Blue Virus (EASY), Yellow Virus (MEDIUM), and Red Virus (HARD).

For competitive players in both games, there is Mixed Match, where you and a friend can play Tetris and Dr. Mario like a tournament! Adjust the handicap levels, play time, music, and other settings to balance your different skills. The game order is: TETRIS B-TYPE (clear a certain amount of lines), DR. MARIO (disinfect a predetermined number of viruses) and TETRIS A-TYPE (clear lines until the time expires). At the end of the time limit, the player with the highest score is the winner.

Select your classic game!
Tetris title screen with the main menu.
Choosing 1PLAYER GAME, you'll enter in this screen and can select the game mode and a music to hear.
In Tetris A-Type mode, you play until the stack crosses the top: is here where the player put the best records!
For each increased level, the blocks gain new colors and the fall speed will go up the challenge!
If the block stack cross the maximum limit, it's game over for you...
Clear 25 lines (and put the best record only with it) in Tetris B-Type mode is the main objective.
After some lines cleared, a new record was established!
The records screen has a limit of 3 names (for each mode), then play much for occupy all of them!
Tetris 2PLAYER GAME in course: both are starting to organize the best attack!
Clearing two or more lines at the same time, you'll add garbage blocks in the opponent's play field.
Challenge some CPU opponents: bonus added to this Tetris version!
Tetris VS. COM match: the adversary is a little girl (MEDIUM Level).
After a good match time, Player 1 defeats another CPU opponent (EASY Level) with a flawless victory!
Dr. Mario title screen with the main menu.
1-Player Game setup screen: change the virus level, fall speed and your favorite music.
Clearing a row of Red capsule parts (with 1 Red Virus included in the "package").
Stage completed! Go to next and good luck!
Can you clear this big infection successfully? With a lot of patience, yes...
Due to the big virus number, the capsule stack crossed the screen top. Game Over...
Battle against CPU opponents (viruses Blue, Yellow and Red): bonus added to this Dr. Mario version!
The Yellow Virus (MEDIUM Level) has faster moves than Blue Virus: beware!
In a bad moment, Red Virus' capsule stack surpasses the bottle top, allowing Player 1 victory again.
The beginning of a 2PLAYER GAME in Dr. Mario.
Mixed Match (think like a "Tetris and Dr. Mario marathon") title screen with main menu.
Selecting OPTION, the CUSTOM GAME screen will appear: it's a complete setup!
Mixed Match game 1: clearing a predetermined number of lines in Tetris B-TYPE.
Mixed Match game 2: a massive viral disinfection with Dr. Mario's vitamin capsules.
Mixed Match game 3: putting highest scores in Tetris A-TYPE.
